thread.title: The Best Super Bowl Prop Bets
thread.title_full: The Best Super Bowl Prop Bets

author: Barry K
title: The Best Super Bowl Prop Bets
text:
It’s been a while since she’s switched things up. What better opportunity than on the Super Bowl halftime stage? 
How many times will “deflate” or “Deflategate” be said on TV during the live broadcast? 
Smart money’s on the UNDER here. The announcers will mention it once, because they have to. But you know the NFL brass has told them not to dwell on this topic. 
How many times will Patriots owner Robert Kraft be shown on TV during the live broadcast? 
Over/under: 2.5 
Easy money! The broadcast will hit this mark in the first quarter. A better bet would be whether Kraft wears his favorite dress shirt—you know, the one with the white collar and blue torso that went out of style in 1986. 
What will Luke Bryan be wearing when he starts singing the U.S. National Anthem?
